original_title: Estiven en Galicia e lembreime de ti
overview: An experiment with live choreography generated in real time to ironically and critically reinterpret the traditional touristic image of Galicia, this video includes images in cities such as Lisbon, Barcelona and Santiago de Compostela and can be prepared to integrate those from any other, adapting choreographies to live music. It covers all of Galiciaâ€™s typical locations that serve as backdrops for the choreographies.
title: Estiven en Galicia e lembreime de ti
